sentences.en: A full-scale debate is under way on what ails the industry.
sentences.cn: 关于工业为何陷入困境正在展开一场全面的讨论。

sentences.en: Britain needs to bridge the technology gap between academia and industry.
sentences.cn: 英国需要弥合学术界和企业界之间的技术差距。

sentences.en: Gould is a man of great industry.
sentences.cn: 古尔德是一个很勤劳的人。

sentences.en: He claims to have his finger on the pulse of the industry.
sentences.cn: 他声称该对行业了如指掌。

sentences.en: He passed the letters to the Department of Trade and Industry.
Hydrogen is used extensively in industry for the production of ammonia.
sentences.cn: 氢气在工业上广泛用于制氨。

sentences.en: I work in the oil industry.

sentences.cn: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.en: Recession has simply accelerated changes that have been reshaping the industry anyway.
sentences.cn: 经济萧条只不过加速了原本就在改变行业状况的变化。

sentences.en: Roadside cafes are now a big part of the catering industry.
sentences.cn: 现在路边小餐馆构成了餐饮业很大一部分。

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards, cuts in defence spending forced the aerospace industry to retrench.
sentences.cn: 不久之后，国防开支的削减迫使航空航天业紧缩开支。

sentences.en: The construction industry is no longer as depressed as it was.
sentences.cn: 建筑业不再像以往那样萧条了。

sentences.en: The direct marketing industry has become adept at packaging special offers.
sentences.cn: 直接邮寄广告业在特卖品的包装方面已经变得非常熟练了。

sentences.en: The drop in travel is bad news for the airline industry.
sentences.cn: 旅游热降温对航空业来说是个坏消息。

sentences.en: The fear is that science could become the handmaiden of industry.
sentences.cn: 人们担心的是科学会成为工业的仆人。

sentences.en: The industry minister described the affair as "an absolute scandal".
sentences.cn: 工业部长将此事件形容为“绝对的丑闻”。

sentences.en: The movie industry had chosen to ignore the encroaching competition of television.
sentences.cn: 电影业故意无视电视业的侵犯性竞争。

sentences.en: This type of software is widely used in industry.
sentences.cn: 这种软件广泛应用于工业。

sentences.en: We are becoming one of the market leaders in the fashion industry.
sentences.cn: 我们正在成为时装业的领军者之一。

trans.tran_cn: 工业，产业（经济词汇），工业界，勤劳
trans.tran_en: businesses that produce a particular type of thing or provide a particular service
